data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
Clarification sought from Premier Energies Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Premier Energies Ltd on January 12 2026 with reference to news appeared in https://www.ndtvprofit.com dated January 12 2026 quoting "Premier Energies To Add 7.4 GW Cell 6 GW Module Capacity Annually At Rs 11000-Crore Capex "

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that Member of the Company have approved:
1. Re-appointment of Mrs. Revathi Rohini Buragadda as a Whole Time Director.
2. Appointment of Mr. Sudhir Moola as a Whole Time Director.
3. Re-appointment of Mr. Uday Pilani Sudhir as an Independent Director of the Company for a Second term.
